meanings.sent1: The smell in the room became even vomitier after the party.
meanings.sent2: The garbage had a vomitier odor than usual.
meanings.sent3: The dog's vomitier breath made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The color of the smoothie was so vomitier, it reminded me of a horror movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the mud was so vomitier that it made me gag.

meanings.sent1: Her soup was vomitier than mine.
meanings.sent2: The smell in the kitchen was getting vomitier by the minute.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur looked even vomitier after rolling in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The taste of the medicine was so vomitier than I expected.
meanings.sent5: The color of the mold on the bread was vomitier than anything I had seen before.

meanings.sent1: The strong smell of the cheese was vomitier than I could handle.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride was making me feel vomitier with each loop.
meanings.sent3: The combination of flavors in the dish was so vomitier, it made my stomach turn.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the spoiled milk was so vomitier that I had to look away.
meanings.sent5: The thought of eating the expired food was vomitier than anything else.
